long_description: This Park Tool specialized pedal wrench has been beefed up to make it even better; 15mm and 9/16" openings for optimal versatility. Reinforcement around the high stress areas and upgraded material creates a stronger more dependable wrench; avoid knuckle skinning break-offs. Extra long, round, vinyl dipped handle provides great leverage and won't dig into your hand like flat wrenches.
short_description: This Park Tool specialized pedal wrench has been beefed up to make it even better; 15mm and 9/16" openings for optimal versatility.
